Class TGCCipherExecutor

    CipherExecutor<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>

    @Component(value="tgcCipherExecutor")
public class TGCCipherExecutor
extends BaseStringCipherExecutor
    This is TGCCipherExecutor that reads TGC keys from the CAS config and presents a cipher.
